## ThemeLoader class

Loads and validates a theme from URL objects.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ThemeLoader 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [isThemeLoaded(theme)](./harp-mapview.themeloader.isthemeloaded.md) | <code>static</code> | Checks if <code>theme</code> instance is completely loaded, meaning that <code>extends</code> property is resolved. |
|  [load(theme, options)](./harp-mapview.themeloader.load.md) | <code>static</code> | Loads a \[\[Theme\]\] from a remote resource, provided as a URL that points to a JSON-encoded theme.<!-- -->By default, resolves following features of theme:<!-- -->- <code>extends</code> - loads and merges all inherited themes (see \[\[resolveBaseTheme\]\]) - <code>ref</code> - resolves all <code>ref</code> instances to their values defined in <code>definitions</code> section of theme (see \[\[resolveThemeReferences\]\])<!-- -->Relative URIs of reference resources are resolved to full URL using the document's base URL (see \[\[resolveUrls\]\]).<!-- -->Custom URIs (of theme itself and of resources referenced by theme) may be resolved with by providing \[\[UriResolver\]\] using \[\[ThemeLoadOptions.uriResolver\]\] option. |
|  [loadAsync(themeUrl)](./harp-mapview.themeloader.loadasync.md) | <code>static</code> |  |
